docs.summary: Events that are fired by actions relating to paid plan.
description: Wix paid plan events are fired on your site's backend when certain events occur related to site paid plans.
You can write event handlers that react to these events. Event handler functions
receive data that corresponds to the event that fired. Use event handlers
to create custom responses to contact events.
To add a paid plan event handler, add an **events.js** file to the **Backend** section
of your site if one does not already exist. All event handler functions for your
site are defined in this file.
Event handler functions are defined using the following pattern:
For example, an event handler that handles paid plan purchases looks

docs.summary: An event that fires when a user purchases a plan.
description: The `onPlanPurchased()` event handler runs when a user purchases a Wix paid plan.
object contains information about the plan that was purchased.

members.name: orderId
members.doc: Order ID of the purchase of the plan.

members.name: planName
members.doc: Name of the plan.

members.name: dateCreated
members.doc: Date and time that the plan was created.

members.name: recurring
members.doc: If the plan is recurring. If true, the price is deducted monthly.

docs.summary: An object representing a new paid plan purchase.

members.name: orderId
members.doc: Order ID of the purchase of the plan, auto-generated when an order is created.

members.name: paymentStatus
members.doc: Status of the payment for the plan, such as PAID.

members.name: price
members.doc: Object containing the price of the plan.

members.name: validFrom
members.doc: Date and time from which the plan is valid.

members.name: planName
members.doc: Name of the plan.

members.name: cashierOrderId
members.doc: ID of the plan for cashier.

members.name: recurring
members.doc: If the plan is recurring. If true, the price is deducted monthly.

members.name: status
members.doc: Status of the plan, such as ACTIVE.

members.name: memberId
members.doc: ID for the visitor who purchased the plan.

members.name: orderType
members.doc: How the plan was purchased, such as ONLINE.

members.name: planId
members.doc: Id of the plan.

members.name: validFor
members.doc: Object containing properties about how long the plan is valid.

docs.summary: An object representing the price of a purchased plan.

members.name: currency
members.doc: Currency of the price, such as USD for US Dollars.

members.name: amount
members.doc: The cost of the plan.

docs.summary: An object representing how long a plan is valid.

members.name: forever
members.doc: If true, the plan does not expire.

members.name: period
members.doc: The period for which the plan is valid. If the plan is valid forever, period is blank.
